post.body: ...you can hold the cigarette lighter this time!
Yep, I'll be there. Looking forward to it...
Hello. awesome Awesome Satrurday... I'm blaming you for the sambuca shambles.
I could just post you a teabag! DM me your address and I'll send you one from the office... seriously.
Yeah, but now your expectation level has been raised, so I fear you shall be disappointed...
ARGH! There goes the elephant of surprise. I'm too impatient. Must learn.
Anything????
Yep...
awesome Awesome pics. And lovin' the captions too. How'd you know my Dad's Colombian?!
Nah. Go public! I'll be twunted in public pretty much every night between now and xmas anyway!
Bit nervous. Was twunted.
I drop-kicked the whole sack into the street. That's how I roll.
Anything in the post?! Am starting to think you won't get it... Hmph.
We know you're there dude. Stop hiding.
@samismail Sneak a peek... http://tinyurl.com/5mecph
getting it later today, barring any fuckups
I made @cozcoz a cuppa on Twitter... posted a teabag to Arkansas... has it arrived yet @cozcoz
still going! Doing slow motion shots now!
how you getting on dude?
Dude... follow @StickItToTesco ... should be good for you!
Was gutted about that card not arriving. Hmpf.
Hey... you know how much you hate Tesco dude? ...
Yep, I hate Royal Mail now.
Right. Well clearly that thing I posted hasn't arrived. Here's what you could've won... http://www.relish-pr.co.uk/christmas/
They're just helping make you the most commented video on YouTube mate. (OK, they are morons.)
Any comment is a good comment...
That is AWESOME. Well done you, and @dafletcher - awesome awesome awesome.
That's just unlucky then. Never mind.
Will somebody please, remove these, cutleries, from my knees...
Phew! Dodged a 30p bullet!
You probably posted it in an A4 envelope with a first class stamp and had the temerity to assume it would arrive, eh @pristyles?
How much do I owe ya?
Was the postage sufficient?! Just tried sending a card to @pristyles (London to London) and screwed it up!!!
@samismail Dudes, check out the official fish slap vid http://tinyurl.com/52sekq
Not sure which piss up you're referring to, but NonsenseBash basically bled into Gentlemen'sDay = 48hr megabender. OK now, just.
Ha!!! Can't believe a 1st class stamp didn't suffice!!
Chilling in Lantana waiting for @pristyles and @charliegower to get a GODDAM Wriggle On!!! Lovely latte, BTW...
Waiting for a night bus. Sober. It doesn't get any worse than this.
making @cozcoz an international cuppa
cheers @oswald808 just seen your reply. Nice pic!
Anyone for a cuppa?
Royal Mail should make a service on the Twitter API that people type in a Special Delivery code, and get a tweet when its signed for.
Thinking that @pristyles should check her post.
Eating soup and bread with lots of seeds in. Telling myself it is counteracting all xmas booze.
Trying to work out how not to get sued.
Diet coke? Done. Cuppa Tea? Done. Berocca? Done. Pizza at lunch STILL making me sleepy...
Whoa!!! iTunes throws up some Beethoven shizz and my productivity skyrockets. (Then I come on Twitter to tell everyone and fuck it up.)
Merry Xmas @everyone
Early (and grainy) Fish Slap footage courtesy of Webuser (thanks dudes): http://tinyurl.com/5mecph
And that's a wrap. Chase caught Jay with one absolute pearl of a shot! Credit to Jay, he didn't go down.
Hmmm. Now which lion do we want for the backdrop?
Off to film a Texan geek twatting an Aussie in the face with a huge fish in Trafalgar square. Starts 8.50 am. All welcome!
Also enjoying your xmas meal. Cheers!
In fact, who else hates Tescos? Anyone?
OPEN INVITE: DM me to see a man who's flown from Texas just to hit another man with a big fish do the deed live in C. London? on Weds AM?
Waiting for someone to fix a website.
Reading a big, big document. And thinking about food.
And while I'm here, anyone got any idea what the HELL I do next with @stickittotesco?
Hmmm. Thinking Fish Slap might catch up with the anti-Tesco thingy http://tinyurl.com/8go6jn
Fish Slap vid just passed 120k views, whoop-de-whoop... http://tinyurl.com/52sekq
Finally getting round to #mewhensmall. I am LITERALLY Mummy's little soldier!
Having an iTunes Conchords Fest while tidying the office...
